step_data.thought: Based on the goal, I need to enable or disable the 'Allow remote shopping assistance' option. Looking at the accessibility tree, I can see this option is present in the form under the Account Information section. The checkbox element with BID '865' is labeled 'Allow remote shopping assistance No' and is currently unchecked (checked='false'). To toggle this option, I need to click on this checkbox.
